de.lambeck.pned.models.data.validation

Interface IValidationController

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    ValidationController

    public interface IValidationController
    Interface for validation controllers for IDataModel.
    Author:
    Thomas Lambeck, 4128320

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void addValidator(IValidator validator, java.lang.String validatorName)
      Adds an IValidator to the Set of validators.
      EValidationResultSeverity getCurrentValidationStatus(java.lang.String modelName)
      Returns the highest previous EValidationResultSeverity for the current set of validations and the specified model.
      void modelRenamed(java.lang.String oldModelName, java.lang.String newModelName)
      Informs the IValidationController to update internal references because a model has been renamed.
      void requestIndividualValidation(java.lang.String validatorName, IDataModel dataModel)
      Request to the IValidationController thread to run the specified IValidator on the specified IDataModel.

    • Method Detail

      • addValidator

        void addValidator(IValidator validator,
                  java.lang.String validatorName)
        Adds an IValidator to the Set of validators.
        Parameters:
        validator - The IValidator to add
        validatorName - The name of the added validator

      • getCurrentValidationStatus

        EValidationResultSeverity getCurrentValidationStatus(java.lang.String modelName)
        Returns the highest previous EValidationResultSeverity for the current set of validations and the specified model. Note: this is intended to be used by some IValidator to decide whether to skip some checks or not.
        Parameters:
        modelName - The name of the model (This is intended to be the full path name of the PNML file represented by this model.)
        Returns:
        EValidationResultSeverity

      • requestIndividualValidation

        void requestIndividualValidation(java.lang.String validatorName,
                                 IDataModel dataModel)
        Request to the IValidationController thread to run the specified IValidator on the specified IDataModel.
        Parameters:
        validatorName - The specified IValidator
        dataModel - The specified IDataModel

      • modelRenamed

        void modelRenamed(java.lang.String oldModelName,
                  java.lang.String newModelName)
        Informs the IValidationController to update internal references because a model has been renamed. (This should happen only on SaveAs operations.)
        Parameters:
        oldModelName - The model name before renaming
        newModelName - The model name after renaming
